Dive into the delightful world of Help Duck, a charming physics-based puzzle game where your mission is to ensure a cute little yellow duck gets its much-needed bath. Use the laws of gravity and fluid dynamics to guide water through intricate levels filled with obstacles and traps. Strategically manipulate pipes, slopes, and interactive objects to overcome barriers and lead the water into the duckâ€™s tub.

With increasing difficulty, diverse environments, and engaging mechanics, Help Duck offers a rewarding challenge for players of all ages. Plan your moves, use objects wisely, and experiment with different strategies to perfect your water-guiding skills. Collect stars, complete levels efficiently, and enjoy the cheerful visuals and sound effects as you help the adorable duck stay clean and happy.
